meanings.definition: To conceal or hide by covering or disguising.
meanings.sent1: The spy was becloaking himself in shadows to avoid detection.
meanings.sent2: She was becloaking her true feelings with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The magician becloaked the rabbit in a hat, making it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The fog becloaked the city, shrouding it in mystery.
meanings.sent5: The ninja's stealthy movements were like becloaking himself in invisibility.

meanings.definition: The act of concealing or disguising something.
meanings.sent1: The becloaking of the treasure map led to a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent2: His becloaking of his intentions made it hard to trust him.
meanings.sent3: The becloaking of the surprise party was nearly ruined by a slip of the tongue.
meanings.sent4: The becloaking of the truth only led to more confusion.
meanings.sent5: The becloaking of the identity of the masked hero added to the intrigue.
